data.actual_result: The gradient background is choppy and not blending
data.expected_result: The gradient background should look smooth
data.short_description: When trying to give a user a role, the gradient background of the role looks choppy
data.steps_to_repro: - get yourself a server or use one you can give roles in - open the mini profile of a user that doesn't already have all roles or go to settings > members - try to add a role and hover over said role before adding it - observe
